body_html:
The problem, as mentioned in the error message, is that one of your tensors has incompatible type (tensor number 2 is a long tensor).
Do something like

x = torch.cat([z,l,k.float()],dim=1)

Also, those questions are better suited for our forums at https://discuss.pytorch.org/
body_text:
The problem, as mentioned in the error message, is that one of your tensors has incompatible type (tensor number 2 is a long tensor).
Do something like
x = torch.cat([z,l,k.float()],dim=1)
Also, those questions are better suited for our forums at https://discuss.pytorch.org/
body:
The problem, as mentioned in the error message, is that one of your tensors has incompatible type (tensor number 2 is a long tensor).
Do something like
```python
x = torch.cat([z,l,k.float()],dim=1)
```

Also, those questions are better suited for our forums at https://discuss.pytorch.org/
